name: Sheeple
description:
Try to get the food on every level.  If HTML5 does not work for some reason, please try the executable. Thanks.

Play as a Sheeple. You've always been told that winning is everything, but is it really?

Made in ~48 hour for TOJam.

Manvir - Programming/Design/Art - @fiverivergames
Alex - Audio/Sound -  @AlexMmusic1
Heather - Art - @hes_bell

WSAD - Movement
Space - Select
